Elkhart.Joseph and Sarah Puterbaugh Farm: Joseph and Sarah Puterbaugh Farm, also known as Puterbaugh-Haines House, is a historic home located in Concord Township, Elkhart County, Indiana. The house was built about 1860, and is a two-story, three bay, Italianate style brick dwelling with a one-story setback wing. It has a hipped roof and features a portico supported by square columns.
